scripts.start-dev: echo "Building with webpack...\n" && NODE_ENV=development node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && echo "Starting backend stub...\n" && NODE_ENV=development node ./src/backend_stub/index.js
scripts.start: echo "Building with webpack...\n" && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && echo "Starting backend stub...\n" && NODE_ENV=production node ./src/backend_stub/index.js
scripts.build: echo "Building with webpack...\n" && NODE_ENV=production node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && echo "\nDone ($?).";
scripts.build-dev: echo "Building with webpack...\n" && NODE_ENV=development node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js && echo "\nDone ($?).";
